FuncDef:
The advertise prefix-attributes flags command enables an IS-IS process to advertise the extended prefix attribute flag.
The undo advertise prefix-attributes flags command disables an IS-IS process from advertising the extended prefix attribute flag. The advertise prefix-attributes flags command enables an IS-IS process to advertise the extended prefix attribute flag. The undo advertise prefix-attributes flags command disables an IS-IS process from advertising the extended prefix attribute flag. By default, an IS-IS process does not advertise the extended prefix attribute flag.
